text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The masks & ventilators were needed months ago. US 1st confirmed covid19 case was 21st January. It's 8th April. If the "cupboard was empty" *why* was it empty? Because instead of listening to the Pandemics Office you closed it down in 2018 due to your ignorance and arrogance
